column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I hadn't eaten here in several years
column2: but decided to eat here on a recent visit to Chicago.  It was not at all as good as I remembered.  The sangria was okay
column3: but I wouldn't order it again.  And I love sangria.  It just wasn't as good as I remembered it.  My spicy potatoes and brussel sprout dishes were fine
column4: but my friend had the paella and said it was definitely not very good.  We gave the leftovers to the cabbie.  Service was very slow as well.  So
column6: too bad we wasted a dinner on this place.
